enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adjusting the MTU value and are closely related in functionality.
The getMTU method retrieves the current MTU value, which can be used to set up the test case for notifyMTU.
The attemptSend method is related to sending packets, which can be influenced by the MTU adjustment made in notifyMTU.
The packet method is used to create and send packets, which can be affected by the MTU adjustment in notifyMTU.
